title: Multiply by 1
text: The first step is to multiply the measurement to be converted by 1; write 1 as a fraction relating the units given and the units needed.

title: Relating kg to lb.
text: The conversion from kilograms to pounds is 1 $$kg=2.2$$ lb.

title: Writing 1 as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between kg and lb., we can rewrite the 1 we multiply in the first step as (2.2 lb)/(1 kg), so we get the expression (20 kg)*(2.2 lb)/(1 kg).

title: Simplifying
text: kg divides out, so we get the expression (20)*(2.2 lb)/(1).

title: Multiplying
text: Multiplying the expression, we get the final answer 44 lb.
